mapper.select: SELECT jylsh AS id, dpdtjyy AS name, '20' + SUBSTRING(jylsh, 8, 6) AS riqi, hphm, hpzl, jycs FROM pda_db.dbo.AC_DATA_DYN AS d WHERE (dpdtjyy IS NOT NULL)
SELECT jylsh AS id, dpdtjyy AS name, '20' + SUBSTRING(jylsh, 8, 6) AS riqi, hphm, hpzl, jycs FROM pda_db.dbo.AC_DATA_DYN AS d WHERE (dpdtjyy IS NOT NULL) and dpdtjyy like concat('%', #{name },'%')
